message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $75. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $75. How about we compromise at $85?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $82. How about we meet in the middle at $87?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a great fit. Would you be willing to go down to $84?
I'm glad you're still interested, but I'm not willing to go as low as $84. How about we meet in the middle at $88?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, but I still think this product is worth it. Would you be willing to go down to $86?
I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm not willing to go as low as $86. I'm willing to make one more compromise, how about we meet in the middle at $89?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a great fit. Would you be willing to go down to $87?
I'm not willing to go as low as $87. I'm willing to sell the product to you for the minimum price I'm willing to accept, which is $90.
I'm not willing to pay $90, I think I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm out of this negotiation.
